mapper.insert: insert into purchase_tb(user_id, product_id, count, created_at) values(#{user_id}, #{product_id}, #{count}, now());
mapper.select: select pu.id, u.username, pr.name, pu.count from (select * from purchase_tb where user_id = #{userId}) pu inner join user_tb u on pu.user_id = u.id inner join product_tb pr on pr.id = pu.product_id
